trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around December 31st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailswas coming out of a bar at about 12:20am new years day morning~ had just turned 2012,,was waiting outside to say goodbye to friends~ and over about five to six minutes- saw these four red lights slowly ascending towards the clouds following each other then when they got to clouds they went out as they went into the clouds... it was clearly not a helocoptor~ or a plane moving to slowly and not making any noise~ very quiet~ i pointed the lights out to two other people that were with me and they clearly saw the same thing..
Summary: 12:20-12:30am observed four lights ascending up- got to clouds went out-
